Articles.Content:
Hi,

I downloaded KSP 1.1, and updates of all mods installed. When I launch my save I have a error message that say : A vessel cannot be charged , or something like that. 

When i try to charge this vessel in the VAB, I had the following message : Craft RK-3 was not loaded because it had the following parts missing: KKAOSS.KIS.Tank.

I reinstalled KIS and KAS mods but i have the same issue, nothing about KKAOSS.KIS.Tank  in my game folder.

Someone know how I can fix this problem, without a starting a new game ?  

debug console when i try to charge the vessel :

[ERROR]: [ShipConstruct]: Trying to load RK-3 - NoAvailablePart found for KKAOSS.KIS.Tank

[ERROR]: Ship file error!

[Warning]: [EditorLogic Warning]: Trying to set rootPartMode, but mode is already set.

(KIS V1.2.7  KPS 1.1.0.1230

I had this problem too. KKAOSS.KIS.Tank is part of the Planetary Base Systems Module, but is only enabled when it detects that KIS is also installed.

To fix this, make sure you have the latest version of the Module Manager in your GameData folder.
Thanks ! Indeed I just update the Module Manager file and everything works now.
